availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew Suter Meek (Greenup County, Kentucky, day laborer and farmer.)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, day laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Thompson Meek. Father of James W. Meek, Milla A. Meek, Sarah E. Meek, and Mary Cynthia Meek. Day laborer in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Greenup County in October 1863. Farmer in Greenup County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 733.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct No. 3, p. 78B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Greenup County, KY, October 1863, p. 15.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 54-25845.
